participant_abstract.sent: We started the meeting by making introductions.

We drew some animals on the whiteboard -- that seemed kind of odd, but I think it was so that we could learn to use the whiteboard marker in the context of an ice-breaking get-to-know-each-other activity.
We discussed the basic cost parameters for our product and brainstormed a few ideas for features we would like to see in the product.

participant_actions.sent: Project manager will write up minutes and probably prepare another meeting.
I will come up with some notes on Working Design.
User Interface Designer will work on general functionality of the product.
Marketing Expert will do something with marketing of the product?

participant_decisions.sent: 12.5 euros production costs*. 25 euros unit cost. call button for finding remote*. international.

participant_problems.sent: Whiteboard pen running out of ink.
Lapel clip microphones keep falling off.
Not really clear what I'm supposed to be doing now.
